message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40
My turn.  Let's wrap this up - a slight edge to me seems fair since you lose value in future rounds.
Considering the inflation, let's meet in the middle. This way, we both get a decent share, and we can wrap this up before the money loses more value for me.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer, it's practically even.  Any more rounds and the money will be worth significantly less for you.
